OOC: A mark is someone who likes the most glittery or overrated wrestlers. =
IE you. The Rock, when he first came in, was jammed down everyone's throats=
. RVD has also earned his dues. DDP and Kanyon are 2 of the most talented w=
restlers today. Kanyon knows moves, major advantage over Matt Hardy. I don'=
t care if he doesn't spit in his hand. The majority of the good wrestlers a=
re placed in WCW ECW. You like WWF better, because they're good guys, and t=
herefore you cheer them on, much like what marks generally do. No shame in =
that, but what I said is completely true and it's not worth arguing the tru=
th. PA: Booker T has been wrestling for 15 years now. HE'S paid his dues...=


  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: KSLawdogg@... 
  To: nbwrpg@ya=
hoogroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, August 17, 2001 10:14 PM
  Subject: Re: Clif=
fjumper & Strafe/Otyebis


  << OOC: Sigh. The Rock has been shoved down my=
 throat and out my ass. It 
  hurts to have to listen to him. RVD and Stone=
 Cold are super talented, and 
  Chris Kanyon and DDP are so incredible tha=
t you'll go blind if you try to 
  watch a match featuring that numb and du=
mb Matt Hardy. I don't rank wrestlers 
  on their mic skills. No offense, U=
nitron, please don't take this personally, 
  but are you a mark? I have fr=
iends who are marks... >>

  (The Rock hasn't been crammed.  He's earned al=
l his dues.  Hell, he could've 
  made millions playing as a pro football p=
layer if it weren't for an injury.  
  A guy that can go from being a pro f=
ootball player to the greatest wrestler 
  in history is a man that deserve=
s respect and recognition.  No WCW has ever 
  done that, and never will.

=
  Chris Kanyon and DDP? Heh, what a bunch of losers.  "It's me, it's me, it=
's 
  DDP." Gee, that sounds a LOT like the Road Dogg ::cough:: rip off ::c=
ough::  
  And hey, dude, I said the only good talent in the Alliance comes=
 from the 
  former WWF stars in it.  I'm pretty sure Stone Cold was in the=
 WWF.  Stone 
  Cold has switched sides so many times it's just plain stupi=
d.  Matt Hardy has 
  more skill than DDP and Kanyon combined.  

  The WCW=
 and ECW crumbled.  The WWF stood tall and proud and kicking butt.  
  Why?=
  WWF owns WCW and ECW.  The WWF is the master of ownage.  I don't know 
  =
what a mark is, though in assassination terms it means I'm someone's target=
.  
  So, hopefully, no I am not a mark.  I find today's slang idiotic and =
simply 
  continues to devastate the English language.  But what I find int=
eresting is 
  you didn't respond to over two-thirds of what I said.)


   =

s/
